title: Natural Language Processing
description: ALFRED should utilize natural language processing to understand and respond to user queries in a conversational manner, making interactions feel intuitive for older adults.
acceptanceCriteria: ALFRED should accurately interpret user phrases and respond appropriately.
Users should feel comfortable speaking naturally without needing to use specific commands.

title: Voice Feedback System
description: The system must provide clear and friendly audio feedback for every user interaction to ensure older adults understand the system's responses and actions.
acceptanceCriteria: ALFRED should provide audio confirmation of completed actions.
Feedback should be delivered in a tone that is warm and reassuring.

title: Reminders and Notifications
description: ALFRED should allow users to set personalized reminders for tasks such as medication intake, appointments, and daily activities through voice commands.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can successfully create, modify, and delete reminders using voice commands.
ALFRED should alert users at the scheduled time with audible notifications.

title: Multimodal Interaction Options
description: The platform must support multiple interaction modalities, including voice commands and simple touch controls, to accommodate the diverse needs of older adults.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can interact with ALFRED using voice or touch without issues.
The interface should be responsive and easy to navigate for both interaction methods.

title: User-Friendly Onboarding Process
description: ALFRED should provide a straightforward onboarding process that guides older adults through the initial setup and familiarizes them with the system functionalities.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can complete the onboarding process without assistance.
The onboarding tutorial should cover essential features and be easy to follow.

title: Contextual Help and Support
description: ALFRED should include a context-sensitive help feature that offers assistance or tips based on user interactions, ensuring support is available when needed.
acceptanceCriteria: Help suggestions should appear when users seem to struggle with a task.
Users can access help easily through voice or touch commands.

title: Event Recommendation System
description: ALFRED should provide personalized recommendations for social events and activities based on the user's interests and preferences, helping to encourage engagement and prevent isolation.
acceptanceCriteria: Users receive event suggestions that align with their stated interests.
Users can easily access details about recommended events through voice commands.

title: Family Communication Support
description: ALFRED must facilitate easy communication between older adults and their family members through voice calls, video calls, and messaging, ensuring that users feel connected.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate calls and messages to family members using simple voice commands.
Video calling features should be intuitive and require minimal setup.

title: Social Engagement Reminders
description: The system should allow users to set reminders for upcoming social events or activities, ensuring that they do not miss opportunities for engagement.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create and customize reminders for social activities through voice commands.
ALFRED sends timely notifications reminding users of upcoming engagements.

title: Community Connection Features
description: ALFRED should provide features that allow users to connect with local community resources, such as support groups or clubs, to foster social inclusion.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily find and access information about local community resources.
ALFRED should suggest community connections based on user preferences.

title: User Feedback Mechanism
description: The platform must include a simple feedback mechanism that allows older adults to express their satisfaction with social features and suggest improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily submit feedback through voice or touch interactions.
Feedback submissions should be acknowledged with an audio confirmation.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
description: ALFRED should integrate with wearable health-monitoring devices to track vital signs such as heart rate, blood pressure, and activity levels, providing users and caregivers with real-time health data.
acceptanceCriteria: ALFRED can successfully receive and display health data from connected devices.
Users can query their health status using voice commands.

title: Emergency Alert System
description: ALFRED must feature an emergency alert system that allows users to quickly notify caregivers or emergency services in case of a health crisis or fall.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can activate emergency alerts using a simple voice command.
The system successfully contacts designated emergency contacts and provides location information.

title: Medication Management System
description: The platform should provide a medication management feature that allows users to track their medications, set reminders for intake, and receive alerts for refills.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily input their medication schedules through voice commands.
ALFRED sends timely notifications for medication intake and refill reminders.

title: Caregiver Communication Portal
description: ALFRED should provide a dedicated communication portal for caregivers to access user health data, medication schedules, and alerts, facilitating better care coordination.
acceptanceCriteria: Caregivers can securely log in and view health and medication information.
ALFRED allows caregivers to send messages to users through the platform.

title: Personalized Health Recommendations
description: The system should analyze user health data and provide personalized health and wellness recommendations, including exercise routines and dietary suggestions.
acceptanceCriteria: Users receive tailored health recommendations based on their health data.
The recommendations can be accessed and understood easily through voice commands.

title: Health Progress Tracking
description: ALFRED must allow users to track their health progress over time, enabling them to visualize changes in their health metrics and receive motivational feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can request summaries of their health progress through voice commands.
ALFRED provides positive reinforcement based on user improvements.

title: Interactive Cognitive Games
description: ALFRED should offer a variety of interactive games designed to stimulate cognitive function, tailored to the user's individual cognitive abilities and preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily access and engage with cognitive games through voice commands.
Games should adapt in difficulty based on user performance to provide appropriate challenges.

title: Physical Activity Challenges
description: The system must provide guided physical activity challenges that encourage users to engage in regular exercise, ensuring activities are suitable for their physical condition.
acceptanceCriteria: Users receive personalized activity suggestions based on their health data and preferences.
ALFRED should track user participation and provide motivational feedback.

title: Progress Tracking for Activities
description: ALFRED should include a feature that allows users to track their progress in physical and cognitive activities over time, helping them visualize improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can request summaries of their activity progress through voice commands.
The system should provide positive reinforcement and insights based on user achievements.

title: Customizable Activity Schedules
description: The platform must enable users to schedule and customize their physical and cognitive activities according to their daily routines and preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily modify their activity schedules using voice commands.
ALFRED should send reminders for scheduled activities to encourage participation.

title: Social Interaction Through Activities
description: ALFRED should facilitate social interaction by allowing users to participate in group activities or challenges with peers, promoting engagement and connection.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can join group activities or challenges through simple voice commands.
The system should notify users about upcoming group events and activities.

title: Adaptive Activity Recommendations
description: The system should analyze user preferences and health data to provide adaptive recommendations for physical and cognitive activities, ensuring safety and engagement.
acceptanceCriteria: Users receive tailored activity suggestions that consider their health status and preferences.
The recommendation engine should adjust suggestions based on user feedback and changes in health.

title: Emergency Response Activation

acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily activate the emergency alert system using a designated voice command.
The system successfully contacts designated emergency contacts and provides location information.

description: The platform should provide an intuitive medication management feature that allows users to set and receive reminders for medication intake and refills.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create and modify their medication schedules using voice commands.
ALFRED sends timely notifications for medication intake and refill reminders.

acceptanceCriteria: Users can successfully navigate the interface with minimal assistance.

title: Social Engagement Tracking

The system provides motivational feedback based on user engagement.

title: Assisted Setup for Non-Tech Savvy Users

acceptanceCriteria: Users can complete the setup process with step-by-step voice prompts.

title: Flexible Activity Scheduling
description: The platform must allow users to customize their schedules for physical and cognitive activities, ensuring they align with their daily routines and preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can easily modify their activity schedules using voice commands.

acceptanceCriteria: Caregivers can view up-to-date health metrics in a dashboard format.

acceptanceCriteria: Caregivers can initiate and receive video calls through the platform.

title: Medication Reminder System

title: Event Recommendation System

acceptanceCriteria: Caregivers can view a consolidated health metrics dashboard.

title: Health Data Alert Customization
description: ALFRED must allow caregivers to customize alert settings for health metrics, ensuring they receive notifications tailored to specific health concerns.
acceptanceCriteria: Caregivers can select which health metrics trigger alerts.

acceptanceCriteria: Caregivers can initiate messages and video calls directly through the platform.

acceptanceCriteria: APIs should be well-documented and accessible to developers.

acceptanceCriteria: Custom commands should be successfully added and recognized by the system.

acceptanceCriteria: ALFRED must demonstrate the ability to engage users with contextually relevant follow-up questions.
Responses should be delivered in a clear and understandable manner.

title: Voice Command Error Handling
description: The system should include robust error handling for misunderstood voice commands, providing helpful suggestions to users.
acceptanceCriteria: ALFRED must acknowledge misinterpreted commands and suggest alternatives.
Users should receive prompts to retry or reformulate their requests.

acceptanceCriteria: Users should be able to select their preferred language for interaction.

acceptanceCriteria: Developers can successfully retrieve user preferences through the API.
